com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.media.implementation

Interface OAuthContract

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OAuthRestProxy

    public interface OAuthContract

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuthTokenResponse getAccessToken(URI oAuthUri, String clientId, String clientSecret, String scope)
      Gets an OAuth access token with specified OAUTH URI, client ID, client secret, and scope.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessToken

        OAuthTokenResponse getAccessToken(URI oAuthUri,
                                  String clientId,
                                  String clientSecret,
                                  String scope)
                           throws ServiceException
        Gets an OAuth access token with specified OAUTH URI, client ID, client secret, and scope.
        Parameters:
        oAuthUri - A URI object which represents an OAUTH URI.
        clientId - A String object which represents a client ID.
        clientSecret - A String object which represents a client secret.
        scope - A String object which represents the scope.
        Returns:
        OAuthTokenResponse
        Throws:
        ServiceException
